metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The friendly name for the workspace that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The friendly name for the connected cluster.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The Azure region with which the workbook will be associated

parameters.name: DailyCap
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where '{Resource:name}' has name
| project DailyQuotaGB  = trim(' ', tostring(properties.workspaceCapping.dailyQuotaGb))
| project DailyQuotaGB = iff(DailyQuotaGB=="-1.0", "Not set", DailyQuotaGB)

parameters.name: MonthlyIngestionMB
parameters.query:
Usage
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| summarize TotalMB=sum(Quantity)

parameters.name: TopDataTypes
parameters.query:
Usage
| summarize IngestionVolume=sum(Quantity) by DataType
| top 5 by IngestionVolume
| project DataType, label=DataType, selected=1

content.query:
Usage
| project TimeGenerated, DataType, Solution, Quantity
| where DataType in ({TopDataTypes})
| summarize IngestionVolumeMB=sum(Quantity) by DataType
| sort by IngestionVolumeMB
| project DataType, IngestionVolumeMB
content.title: Total Volume (MB)

content.query:
Usage
| where DataType in ({TopDataTypes})
| project TimeGenerated, DataType, Quantity
| summarize IngestionVolumeMB=sum(Quantity) by bin(TimeGenerated, {Timeframe:grain}), DataType
content.title: Ingestion Over Time (MB)

items.name: Ingestion TimeChart of Top Data Types

content.query:
// changes that affect total usage the most
let TotalMonthlyIngestionMB=
Usage
| summarize sum(Quantity); //MB
Usage
| project TimeGenerated, DataType, Quantity
| summarize IngestionVolumeMB=sum(Quantity) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), DataType
| summarize Timestamp=make_list(TimeGenerated), IngestionVolumeMB=make_list(IngestionVolumeMB) by DataType
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(IngestionVolumeMB)
| mv-expand Timestamp, IngestionVolumeMB, series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_ad_score, series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_baseline
| project-away series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_ad_flag, series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_ad_score
| project-rename ExpectedIngestionVolumeMB=series_decompose_anomalies_IngestionVolumeMB_baseline
| extend GapVolumeMB = toint(IngestionVolumeMB)-toint(ExpectedIngestionVolumeMB)
| where GapVolumeMB != 0
| extend Trend=iff(GapVolumeMB>0, "Up", "Down")
| extend IngestedVsExpectedAsPercent = IngestionVolumeMB*100/ExpectedIngestionVolumeMB
| extend GapAsPercentOfTotalMonthlyIngestion = abs(GapVolumeMB)*100/toscalar(TotalMonthlyIngestionMB)
// The daily gap's volume is significant: over 0.1% of the total monthly volume
| where GapAsPercentOfTotalMonthlyIngestion > 0.1
// the ingested vs expected ratio is significant: over 150% or under 66% of the expected daily volume
| where IngestedVsExpectedAsPercent > 150 or IngestedVsExpectedAsPercent < 66
| sort by todatetime(Timestamp) asc
| project DataType, Timestamp=format_datetime(todatetime(Timestamp), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Trend, IngestionVolumeMB//, IngestedVsExpectedAsPercent
content.title: Ingestion Anomalies

content.query:
ContainerLog 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize dcount(Image)
content.title: Count of Images

content.query:
KubePodInventory 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize dcount(PodUid)
content.title: Count of Pods

content.query:
ContainerLog 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize dcount(ContainerID)
content.title: Count of Containers

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on a row to see more details about the host and the severity information for the same._

content.query:
ContainerLog
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| summarize by Computer, Image, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated desc | distinct Computer, Image //| limit 1
| where Image != ""
content.title: Various Images available on the nodes

content.query:
let row = dynamic({Row});
ContainerLog
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{Row}' == '{}' or (Computer == row.Computer and Image == row.Image)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, TimeOfCommand, ContainerID, Image
| distinct Computer, Image,  ContainerID
content.title: Container running with selected node & image

content.query:
ContainerInventory
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project Computer, Name, Image, ImageTag, ContainerState, CreatedTime, StartedTime, FinishedTime
| render table
content.title: List all of a container's lifecycle information

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
//| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kube_pod_status_phase"
| project Tags, Computer
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend phase = tostring(json.phase)
| extend PodName = tostring(json.pod)
| extend namespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| summarize count(PodName) by phase
content.title: Pod Count per phase

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
//| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kube_pod_status_phase"
| project Tags, Computer
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend phase = tostring(json.phase)
| extend PodName = tostring(json.pod)
| extend namespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| summarize count(PodName) by namespace
content.title: Pod Count per namespace

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
//| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kube_pod_status_phase"
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| project Tags, Computer
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend phase = tostring(json.phase)
| extend PodName = tostring(json.pod)
| extend namespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| distinct Computer, PodName, phase, namespace
content.title: Pod & Namespace per Phase

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
//| where Computer in ({Computer})
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "kube_pod_container_status" and Name !contains "reason"
| project Tags, Computer, Name
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend container = tostring(json.container)
| extend PodName = tostring(json.pod)
| extend namespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| distinct Computer, PodName, container, namespace, Name
content.title: Pod, Container status

content.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name has "kube_pod_container_status" and Name !contains "reason"
| project Tags, Computer, Name
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend container = tostring(json.container)
| extend PodName = tostring(json.pod)
| extend namespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| distinct Computer, PodName, container, namespace, Name
| summarize Waiting = countif(Name == "kube_pod_container_status_waiting"), 
Terminated = countif(Name == "kube_pod_container_status_terminated"), 
Running = countif(Name == "kube_pod_container_status_running"), 
Ready = countif(Name == "kube_pod_container_status_ready") by container
content.title: Container status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace
| summarize dcount(Name) by Computer
content.title: Count of Pod running in each Node

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerID
| summarize dcount(ContainerID) by Computer
content.title: Count of Container running in each Node

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Namespace, Name, _ResourceId, PodStatus
| summarize count() by PodStatus
content.title: Pod Status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Namespace, Name, _ResourceId, PodStatus
content.title: Pod Status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
| summarize sum(PodRestartCount) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), Name
content.title: Pod Restarts over Time

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Namespace, Name, _ResourceId, ContainerStatus, ContainerID
| summarize count() by ContainerStatus
content.title: Container Status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| extend PodName = Name
| distinct Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, _ResourceId, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ContainerID
content.title: Container Status

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
| summarize sum(ContainerRestartCount) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), ContainerName
content.title: Container details

content.json: ## ðŸ’¡ _Click on a Pod to see more details about the Container's listed, logs, events and more information._

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerName
| extend PodName = Name
| project-away Name
| project-reorder Computer, PodName, Namespace, ContainerName
content.title: List Node, Pod, Containers

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}", "-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(startDateTime)
| where Namespace in('default', 'kube-system', 'nc-system', 'calico-system') // and ControllerKind == 'ReplicaSet' // the system namespace filter goes here
| distinct
    ClusterName,
    Computer,
    PodUid,
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    ContainerStatus,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| summarize
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *),
    TotalPODCount = count(),
    podCount = sumif(1, PodStatus == 'Running' or PodStatus != 'Running'),
    containerNotrunning = sumif(1, ContainerStatus != 'running')
    by
    ClusterName,
    TimeGenerated,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| project
    ClusterName,
    ServiceName,
    podCount,
    containerNotrunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent = (containerNotrunning * 100 / podCount),
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Environment = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[3]),
    Location = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[4]),
    ContainerStatus,
    ControllerKind,
    Name,
    Computer
//Uncomment the below line to set for automated alert
| where PodStatus == "Running" //and containerNotrunningPercent > _minalertThreshold and containerNotrunningPercent < _maxalertThreshold
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), c_entry=count() by PodLabel, ServiceName, ClusterName, ControllerKind, Name, Computer
//Below lines are to parse the labels to identify the impacted service/component name
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'k8s-app', @'k8sapp', PodLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/component', @'appkubernetesiocomponent', parseLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/instance', @'appkubernetesioinstance', parseLabel)
| extend tags = todynamic(parseLabel)
| extend tag01 = todynamic(tags[0].app)
| extend tag02 = todynamic(tags[0].k8sapp)
| extend tag03 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesiocomponent)
| extend tag04 = todynamic(tags[0].aadpodidbinding)
| extend tag05 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesioinstance)
| extend tag06 = todynamic(tags[0].component)
| extend ContainerRunning = 100 - containerNotrunningPercent
| project ClusterName, TimeGenerated, ControllerKind, Name, Computer,
    ServiceName = strcat(ServiceName, tag01, tag02, tag03, tag04, tag05, tag06),
    ContainerUnavailable = strcat("Unavailable Percentage: ", containerNotrunningPercent),
    ContainerRunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent,
    PodStatus = PodStatus, 
    ContainerStatus = ContainerStatus
content.title: Pod/Container Availability

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of PodUid by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of PodCreationTimeStamp by max(1), top-nested of PodRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of PodStartTime by max(1), top-nested of PodStatus by max(1), top-nested of PodIp by max(1), top-nested of ServiceName by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Pod details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| top-nested of ContainerID by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of Computer by max(1), top-nested of Namespace by max(1), top-nested of Name by max(1), top-nested of ContainerLastStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerName by max(1), top-nested of ContainerRestartCount by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStartTime by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatus by max(1), top-nested of ContainerStatusReason by max(1), top-nested of ControllerKind by max(1), top-nested of ControllerName by max(1)
| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName
content.title: Container details

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join KubeEvents on Computer, Name, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Name, Reason, Message, KubeEventType, SourceComponent
| extend PodName = Name
content.title: KubeEvents for the Pods

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join ContainerLog on Computer, ContainerID, _ResourceId
| project-away TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated1, ContainerID, TimeOfCommand, Image, LogEntry, LogEntrySource
| project-rename TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated1
content.title: Container Log
